metadata.title: CVE-2024-38562 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:nl80211: Avoid address calculations via out of bounds array indexing Beforerequest->channels[] can be used, request->n_channels must be set.Additionally, address calculations for memory after the "channels" arrayneed to be calculated from the allocation base ("request") rather than viathe first "out of bounds" index of "channels", otherwise run-time boundschecking will throw a warning.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
